item.title: Using DevExpress ASP.Net Spin Editor Control
item.description: The DevExpress ASP.Net spin editor control is one of those simple but extremely useful controls. I tend to use this control a lot in my projects. It basically is a text input field which only allows the user to enter numeric data. I know on the face of it does not seem revolutionary, but a few things I like about the control are:
